subject: Your trial is almost over - 10 days left
body:
Only 10 Days Left!
























User Name: billcampus 
Now is the time to take advantage of the remaining days in your free Email Marketing trial. Once your trial has ended, you will have limited feature access - you will not be able to send emails. Login today to make the most of your trial. 














Ready to upgrade to a paying account?
There are two easy ways to do it: 

Log in to your account, click on My Account and then Pay for Products.
Call a  Communication Consultant at 1-866-876-8464.

Don't miss out! Constant Contact can make a difference for you just like it has for these businesses. 



	
						"I love that, in just minutes, I can create a professional newsletter or store announcement that has a consistent look with our store"--Rebecca Cross, Create My Keepsake
						




						"I don't need a designer. I don't have to wait for a printer or the US Postal Service to get it delivered. I can hit send and watch how many people open, and where they click on my site. And I can do it all on my laptop. It's amazing!"--Abby Weaver, Fajita Grill
						
















Questions? Please give us a call!
US / Canada Toll Free: 1-866-876-8464
Outside US / Canada: 1-781-472-8140
